description: Experience luxury in this rarely available townhouse in East Abbotsford, perfectly situated for privacy, backing onto an amazing private backyard. This spacious home features 3 bedrooms, including a double master layout, a versatile flex room (optional 4th bedroom), and 3 baths. The 2-car garage includes custom storage shelving. Stylish finishes include brick-accented exteriors, hardwood floors, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a gas range. With 10' ceilings, crown mouldings, new carpets, and fresh paint, itâ€™s move-in ready. Enjoy central AC, central vac, a spa-like ensuite with a heated floor, & updated backyard with a gas BBQ hookup, new canopy and new fences. Plus, parking for 4 cars. Close to top schools and amenities.
